description: Retrieves the tax registration of accounts listed in a consolidated billing family. This can be used to retrieve up to 100 accounts' tax registrations in one call (default 50).

nested_items.name: accountDetails
nested_items.description: The list of account details. This contains account Ids and TRN Information for each of the linked accounts.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: List of unique account identifiers.

nested_items.name: accountMetaData
nested_items.description: The meta data information associated with the account.

nested_items.name: accountName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services accounts name.

nested_items.name: addressLine1
nested_items.description: The first line of the address.

nested_items.name: addressLine2
nested_items.description: The second line of the address, if applicable.

nested_items.name: addressLine3
nested_items.description: The third line of the address, if applicable. Currently, the Tax Settings API accepts the addressLine3 parameter only for Saudi Arabia. When you specify a TRN in Saudi Arabia, you must enter the addressLine3 and specify the building number for the address. For example, you might enter 1234.

nested_items.name: city
nested_items.description: The city that the address is in.

nested_items.name: countryCode
nested_items.description: The country code for the country that the address is in.

nested_items.name: districtOrCounty
nested_items.description: The district or county the address is located.

nested_items.name: postalCode
nested_items.description: The postal code associated with the address.

nested_items.name: stateOrRegion
nested_items.description: The state, region, or province that the address is located. This field is only required for Canada, India, United Arab Emirates, Romania, and Brazil (CPF). It is optional for all other countries.

nested_items.name: addressRoleMap
nested_items.description: Address roles associated with the account containing country code information.

nested_items.name: countryCode
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: countryCode
nested_items.description: The country code of the jurisdiction.

nested_items.name: stateOrRegion
nested_items.description: The state, region, or province associated with the country of the jurisdiction, if applicable.

nested_items.name: addressType
nested_items.description: The type of address associated with the legal profile.

nested_items.name: seller
nested_items.description: Seller information associated with the account.

nested_items.name: taxInheritanceDetails
nested_items.description: Tax inheritance information associated with the account.

nested_items.name: inheritanceObtainedReason
nested_items.description: Tax inheritance reason information associated with the account.

nested_items.name: parentEntityId
nested_items.description: Tax inheritance parent account information associated with the account.

nested_items.name: taxRegistration
nested_items.description: Your TRN information. Instead of having full legal address, here TRN information will have jurisdiction details (for example, country code and state/region/province if applicable).

nested_items.name: additionalTaxInformation
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN.

nested_items.name: brazilAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Brazil. The Tax Settings API returns this information in your response when any additional information is present with your TRN in Brazil.

nested_items.name: ccmCode
nested_items.description: The Cadastro de Contribuintes MobiliÃ¡rios (CCM) code for your TRN in Brazil. This only applies for a CNPJ tax type for the SÃ£o Paulo municipality.

nested_items.name: legalNatureCode
nested_items.description: Legal nature of business, based on your TRN in Brazil. This only applies for a CNPJ tax type.

nested_items.name: canadaAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Canada.

nested_items.name: canadaQuebecSalesTaxNumber
nested_items.description: The Quebec Sales Tax ID number. Leave blank if you do not have a Quebec Sales Tax ID number.

nested_items.name: canadaRetailSalesTaxNumber
nested_items.description: Manitoba Retail Sales Tax ID number. Customers purchasing Amazon Web Services services for resale in Manitoba must provide a valid Retail Sales Tax ID number for Manitoba. Leave this blank if you do not have a Retail Sales Tax ID number in Manitoba or are not purchasing Amazon Web Services services for resale.

nested_items.name: isResellerAccount
nested_items.description: The value for this parameter must be true if the provincialSalesTaxId value is provided for a TRN in British Columbia, Saskatchewan, or Manitoba provinces.

nested_items.name: provincialSalesTaxId
nested_items.description: The provincial sales tax ID for your TRN in Canada. This parameter can represent the following:
Provincial sales tax ID number for British Columbia and Saskatchewan provinces.
Manitoba retail sales tax ID number for Manitoba province.
Quebec sales tax ID number for Quebec province.

nested_items.name: egyptAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information to specify for a TRN in Egypt.

nested_items.name: uniqueIdentificationNumber
nested_items.description: The unique identification number provided by the Egypt Tax Authority.

nested_items.name: uniqueIdentificationNumberExpirationDate
nested_items.description: The expiration date of the unique identification number provided by the Egypt Tax Authority.

nested_items.name: estoniaAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Estonia.

nested_items.name: registryCommercialCode
nested_items.description: Registry commercial code (RCC) for your TRN in Estonia. This value is an eight-numeric string, such as 12345678.

nested_items.name: georgiaAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Georgia.

nested_items.name: personType
nested_items.description: The legal person or physical person assigned to this TRN in Georgia.

nested_items.name: greeceAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information to specify for a TRN in Greece.

nested_items.name: contractingAuthorityCode
nested_items.description: The code of contracting authority for e-invoicing.

nested_items.name: indiaAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information in India.

nested_items.name: pan
nested_items.description: India pan information associated with the account.

nested_items.name: indonesiaAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Indonesia.

nested_items.name: decisionNumber
nested_items.description: VAT-exempt customers have a Directorate General of Taxation (DGT) exemption letter or certificate (Surat Keterangan Bebas) decision number. Non-collected VAT have a DGT letter or certificate (Surat Keterangan Tidak Dipungut).

nested_items.name: ppnExceptionDesignationCode
nested_items.description: Exception code if you are designated by Directorate General of Taxation (DGT) as a VAT collector, non-collected VAT, or VAT-exempt customer.

nested_items.name: taxRegistrationNumberType
nested_items.description: The tax registration number type.

nested_items.name: israelAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Israel.

nested_items.name: customerType
nested_items.description: Customer type for your TRN in Israel. The value can be Business or Individual. Use ``Business``for entities such as not-for-profit and financial institutions.

nested_items.name: dealerType
nested_items.description: Dealer type for your TRN in Israel. If you're not a local authorized dealer with an Israeli VAT ID, specify your tax identification number so that Amazon Web Services can send you a compliant tax invoice.

nested_items.name: italyAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Italy.

nested_items.name: cigNumber
nested_items.description: The tender procedure identification code.

nested_items.name: cupNumber
nested_items.description: Additional tax information to specify for a TRN in Italy. This is managed by the Interministerial Committee for Economic Planning (CIPE) which characterizes every public investment project (Individual Project Code).

nested_items.name: sdiAccountId
nested_items.description: Additional tax information to specify for a TRN in Italy. Use CodiceDestinatario to receive your invoices via web service (API) or FTP.

nested_items.name: taxCode
nested_items.description: List of service tax codes for your TRN in Italy. You can use your customer tax code as part of a VAT Group.

nested_items.name: kenyaAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Kenya.

nested_items.name: personType
nested_items.description: The legal person or physical person assigned to this TRN in Kenya.

nested_items.name: malaysiaAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Malaysia.

nested_items.name: businessRegistrationNumber
nested_items.description: The tax registration number (TRN) in Malaysia.

nested_items.name: serviceTaxCodes
nested_items.description: List of service tax codes for your TRN in Malaysia.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: taxInformationNumber
nested_items.description: The tax information number in Malaysia.

nested_items.name: polandAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Poland.

nested_items.name: individualRegistrationNumber
nested_items.description: The individual tax registration number (NIP). Individual NIP is valid for other taxes excluding VAT purposes.

nested_items.name: isGroupVatEnabled
nested_items.description: True if your business is a member of a VAT group with a NIP active for VAT purposes. Otherwise, this is false.

nested_items.name: romaniaAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information to specify for a TRN in Romania.

nested_items.name: taxRegistrationNumberType
nested_items.description: The tax registration number type. The value can be TaxRegistrationNumber or LocalRegistrationNumber.

nested_items.name: saudiArabiaAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Saudi Arabia.

nested_items.name: taxRegistrationNumberType
nested_items.description: The tax registration number type.

nested_items.name: southKoreaAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in South Korea.

nested_items.name: businessRepresentativeName
nested_items.description: The business legal name based on the most recently uploaded tax registration certificate.

nested_items.name: itemOfBusiness
nested_items.description: Item of business based on the most recently uploaded tax registration certificate.

nested_items.name: lineOfBusiness
nested_items.description: Line of business based on the most recently uploaded tax registration certificate.

nested_items.name: spainAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Spain.

nested_items.name: registrationType
nested_items.description: The registration type in Spain.

nested_items.name: turkeyAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Turkey.

nested_items.name: industries
nested_items.description: The industry information that tells the Tax Settings API if you're subject to additional withholding taxes. This information required for business-to-business (B2B) customers. This information is conditionally mandatory for B2B customers who are subject to KDV tax.

nested_items.name: kepEmailId
nested_items.description: The Registered Electronic Mail (REM) that is used to send notarized communication. This parameter is optional for business-to-business (B2B) and business-to-government (B2G) customers. It's not required for business-to-consumer (B2C) customers.

nested_items.name: secondaryTaxId
nested_items.description: Secondary tax ID ('harcama birimi VKN'si'). If one isn't provided, we will use your VKN as the secondary ID.

nested_items.name: taxOffice
nested_items.description: The tax office where you're registered. You can enter this information as a string. The Tax Settings API will add this information to your invoice. This parameter is required for business-to-business (B2B) and business-to-government customers. It's not required for business-to-consumer (B2C) customers.

nested_items.name: ukraineAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Ukraine.

nested_items.name: ukraineTrnType
nested_items.description: The tax registration type.

nested_items.name: uzbekistanAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information associated with your TRN in Uzbekistan.

nested_items.name: taxRegistrationNumberType
nested_items.description: The tax registration number type. The tax registration number type valid values are Business and Individual.

nested_items.name: vatRegistrationNumber
nested_items.description: The unique 12-digit number issued to identify VAT-registered identities in Uzbekistan.

nested_items.name: vietnamAdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional tax information to specify for a TRN in Vietnam.

nested_items.name: electronicTransactionCodeNumber
nested_items.description: The electronic transaction code number on the tax return document. This field must be provided for successful API operation.

nested_items.name: enterpriseIdentificationNumber
nested_items.description: The enterprise identification number for tax registration. This field must be provided for successful API operation.

nested_items.name: paymentVoucherNumber
nested_items.description: The payment voucher number on the tax return payment document. This field must be provided for successful API operation.

nested_items.name: paymentVoucherNumberDate
nested_items.description: The date on the tax return payment document. This field must be provided for successful API operation.

nested_items.name: certifiedEmailId
nested_items.description: The email address to receive VAT invoices.

nested_items.name: jurisdiction
nested_items.description: The jurisdiction associated with your TRN information.

nested_items.name: countryCode
nested_items.description: The country code of the jurisdiction.

nested_items.name: stateOrRegion
nested_items.description: The state, region, or province associated with the country of the jurisdiction, if applicable.

nested_items.name: legalName
nested_items.description: The legal name associated with your TRN information.

nested_items.name: registrationId
nested_items.description: Your tax registration unique identifier.

nested_items.name: registrationType
nested_items.description: The type of your tax registration. This can be either VAT or GST.

nested_items.name: sector
nested_items.description: The industry that describes your business. For business-to-business (B2B) customers, specify Business. For business-to-consumer (B2C) customers, specify Individual. For business-to-government (B2G), specify Government.Note that certain values may not applicable for the request country. Please refer to country specific information in API document.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of your TRN. This can be either Verified, Pending, Deleted, or Rejected.

nested_items.name: taxDocumentMetadatas
nested_items.description: The metadata for your tax document.

nested_items.name: taxDocumentAccessToken
nested_items.description: The tax document access token, which contains information that the Tax Settings API uses to locate the tax document.

nested_items.name: taxDocumentName
nested_items.description: The name of your tax document.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results.
